page.title: 10SENIOR CITIZEN'S DAY
page.content:
A typical senior citizen (pensioner) gets up at around 8.00. Many pensioners have dogs and often go for a walk with their dogs after breakfast.
Relaxation, in the form of an afternoon sleep, usually takes place after lunch. Many watch TV, or read books.
Some of the men and women play bowls on the local bowling green, others go to the Mexborough Arms public house.
Most have lived in the Thorner area for more than five years. Many have retired and then moved from Leeds to Thorner because it is so quiet, unlike the city.
